name: Kout by koutbo6.com
description:
Play kout like you have never played it before. Kout is a popular Spades variant from the middle eastern. It is a team based card game that is very popular in Kuwait, and from the team that brought you koutbo6.com.

Learn and enjoy playing kout against your friends or enjoy challenging other people in our daily friendly tournaments, and play either the 4 player or 6 players variant of the game.

Or upgrade to a pro account and participate in solo challenges, pro tournaments, and see your rating increase to be listed in our leaderboards
